info.title: Hotel Booking API
info.description: API for a hotel booking system with user authentication, hotel management, room management, and booking operations

get.description: Returns a list of all hotels with optional filtering

parameters.name: minPrice
parameters.description: Filter hotels by minimum price per day

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: Filter hotels by maximum price per day

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search hotels by name, description, or city

get.description: Returns a single hotel by ID with rooms

put.description: Update a hotel by ID (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a hotel by ID (admin only)

get.description: Returns all rooms for a specific hotel

post.description: Create a new room for a specific hotel (admin only)

get.description: Returns available rooms for a specific hotel and date range
Returns a single room by ID

put.description: Update a room by ID (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a room by ID (admin only)

get.description: Returns all bookings with optional filtering (admin only)

post.description: Create a new booking for authenticated user

400.description: Bad request - Room not available or invalid dates

get.description: Returns all bookings for the authenticated user
Returns a single booking by ID for the authenticated user

patch.description: Cancel a booking by ID for the authenticated user

400.description: Bad request - Cannot cancel after check-in date

post.description: Check-in to a booking using Aadhaar verification

400.description: Bad request - Invalid Aadhaar number or already checked in
